mapper.update: create table if not exists ${tableName} ( id int unsigned not null auto_increment, json_data varchar(2000), battery_id char(12) not null, code varchar(40) not null, heart_type tinyint,/*心跳类型*/ sim_code varchar(40), /*sim卡号*/ version varchar(40),/*版本*/ loc_type tinyint,/*位置类型（1.GPS 2.CELL*/ current_signal smallint, /*当前信号*/ signal_type tinyint, /*信号类型 0:2g 1:3G 2:4G 3:NBIot*/ lbs varchar(100), /*基站信息“mcc,mnc,lac,cellid”*/ lng double, /*经度*/ lat double, /*纬度*/ voltage int, /*电压*/ electricity int, /*电流*/ serials smallint, single_voltage varchar(100), /*电池每串单体电压*/ balance int, /*电芯的均衡状态0关闭,1开启*/ temp varchar(100), /*温度*/ current_capacity int, /*当前容量*/ volume tinyint,/*当前电量*/ circle int,/*循环次数*/ mos tinyint, fault int, heart_interval smallint, /*心跳间隔*/ is_motion tinyint, uncap_state tinyint,/*开盖状态*/ mode tinyint,/*工作状态*/ protect varchar(100), /*保护次数*/ battery_lease int, cell_model varchar(40),/*电池型号*/ cell_mfr varchar(40),/*电芯厂家*/ batt_mfr varchar(40),/*电池厂家*/ mfd varchar(40),/*生产日期*/ bms_model varchar(40),/*BMS型号*/ material tinyint, /*材质1.三元,2.磷酸铁锂,3.铅酸*/ batt_type tinyint,/*电池类型*/ nominal_capacity int, /*标准容量*/ circle_capacity int,/*循环容量*/ cell_full_vol int, cell_cut_vol int, self_dsg_rate int, ocv_table varchar(150), /*路电压值*/ cell_ov_trip int, cell_ov_resume int, cell_ov_delay int, cell_uv_trip int, cell_uv_resume int, cell_uv_delay int, pack_ov_trip int, pack_ov_resume int, pack_ov_delay int, pack_uv_trip int, pack_uv_resume int, pack_uv_delay int, chg_ot_trip int, chg_ot_resume int, chg_ot_delay int, chg_ut_trip int, chg_ut_resume int, chg_ut_delay int, chg_oc_trip int, chg_oc_delay int, chg_oc_release int, dsg_ot_trip int, dsg_ot_resume int, dsg_ot_delay int, dsg_ut_trip int, dsg_ut_resume int, dsg_ut_delay int, dsg_oc_trip int, dsg_oc_delay int, dsg_oc_release int, rsns int, hard_oc_trip int, hard_oc_delay int, sc_trip int, sc_delay int, hard_ov_trip int, hard_ov_delay int, hard_uv_trip int, hard_uv_delay int, sd_release int, function int, ntc_config int, sample_r int, motionless smallint,/*静止状态时心跳间隔*/ standby smallint, /*存储状态时心跳间隔*/ dormancy smallint, /*休眠状态时心跳间隔*/ cabinet_id char(12),/*柜子id*/ box_num varchar(10),/*格口编号*/ total_capacity int, /*总容量*/ distance int, create_time datetime not null,/*创建时间*/ primary key (id), index idx_battery_report_battery_id_create_time (battery_id, create_time), index idx_battery_report_battery_id (battery_id) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO hdg_battery_report_${suffix} ( battery_id, json_data, code, heart_type, sim_code, version, loc_type, current_signal, signal_type, lbs, lng, lat, voltage, electricity, serials, single_voltage, balance, temp, current_capacity, volume, circle, mos, fault, heart_interval, is_motion, uncap_state, mode, protect, battery_lease, cell_model, cell_mfr, batt_mfr, mfd, bms_model, material, batt_type, nominal_capacity, circle_capacity, cell_full_vol, cell_cut_vol, self_dsg_rate, ocv_table, cell_ov_trip, cell_ov_resume, cell_ov_delay, cell_uv_trip, cell_uv_resume, cell_uv_delay, pack_ov_trip, pack_ov_resume, pack_ov_delay, pack_uv_trip, pack_uv_resume, pack_uv_delay,
chg_ot_trip, chg_ot_resume, chg_ot_delay, chg_ut_trip, chg_ut_resume, chg_ut_delay, chg_oc_trip, chg_oc_delay, chg_oc_release, dsg_ot_trip, dsg_ot_resume, dsg_ot_delay, dsg_ut_trip, dsg_ut_resume, dsg_ut_delay, dsg_oc_trip, dsg_oc_delay, dsg_oc_release, rsns, hard_oc_trip, hard_oc_delay, sc_trip, sc_delay, hard_ov_trip, hard_ov_delay, hard_uv_trip, hard_uv_delay, sd_release, function, ntc_config, sample_r, motionless, standby, dormancy, cabinet_id, box_num, total_capacity, distance, create_time ) values ( #{batteryId}, #{jsonData}, #{code}, #{heartType}, #{simCode}, #{version}, #{locType}, #{currentSignal}, #{signalType}, #{lbs}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{voltage}, #{electricity}, #{serials}, #{singleVoltage}, #{balance}, #{temp}, #{currentCapacity}, #{volume}, #{circle}, #{mos}, #{fault}, #{heartInterval}, #{isMotion}, #{uncapState}, #{mode}, #{protect}, #{batteryLease}, #{cellModel}, #{cellMfr}, #{battMfr}, #{mfd}, #{bmsModel}, #{material}, #{battType}, #{nominalCapacity}, #{circleCapacity}, #{cellFullVol}, #{cellCutVol}, #{selfDsgRate}, #{ocvTable}, #{cellOvTrip}, #{cellOvResume}, #{cellOvDelay}, #{cellUvTrip}, #{cellUvResume}, #{cellUvDelay}, #{packOvTrip}, #{packOvResume}, #{packOvDelay}, #{packUvTrip}, #{packUvResume}, #{packUvDelay}, #{chgOtTrip}, #{chgOtResume}, #{chgOtDelay}, #{chgUtTrip}, #{chgUtResume}, #{chgUtDelay}, #{chgOcTrip}, #{chgOcDelay}, #{chgOcRelease}, #{dsgOtTrip}, #{dsgOtResume}, #{dsgOtDelay}, #{dsgUtTrip}, #{dsgUtResume}, #{dsgUtDelay}, #{dsgOcTrip}, #{dsgOcDelay}, #{dsgOcRelease}, #{rsns}, #{hardOcTrip}, #{hardOcDelay}, #{scTrip}, #{scDelay}, #{hardOvTrip}, #{hardOvDelay}, #{hardUvTrip}, #{hardUvDelay}, #{sdRelease}, #{function}, #{ntcConfig}, #{sampleR}, #{motionless}, #{standby}, #{dormancy}, #{cabinetId}, #{boxNum}, #{totalCapacity}, #{distance}, #{createTime} )
